reviews.review: One of my all time favorite games. I liked Portal 2 even more than I liked Portal 1, I loved getting a look at the history of Aperture. 10/10 game.

A really good sequel to the original. A lot longer and bigger in spectacle. Love Wheatley and Glados. There are a some ''find the tiny spot where you can place a portal" puzzles, but there aren't too many of those. While I prefer the first game, this one certainly didn't disappoint.

Birinci oyunun sonuna eklenen ufacık bir sahne eklentisi üzerine, bu oyunda harika bir senaryo yazılmış. Oynanış üzerine çeşitli sıvı kullanımları, engelleyici duvarlar ve yer çekimsel alan gibi harika eklentiler yapılmış ve oynanışı bir üst noktaya taşımış. Senaryoya gelirsek spoiler vermeden diyebileceğim tek şey; muazzam. Harika kurgulanmış bir senaryo ve senaryo anlatımı güzel olmasına rağmen etrafa gizlenen ufak tefek gizemlerle senaryoyu zenginleştirmişler; bu baya hoşuma gitti. Müziklere ve seslendirmeye gelirsek, hepsi çok güzel; zaten adamlar oyun için özel şarkılar yapmış. Portal'ın diğer güzel yanlarından birisi de; oyundaki kendine has mizahıdır. Kısaca oyun türünün en iyi örneği. Almanızı şiddetle tavsiye ederim.

10/10
I love Portal 2! Amazing story, nice gameplay and amazing graphics!
Es ist ein Denkspiel was mir sehr lang Spaß macht und es auch immer noch tut  kann es jedem empfehelen

Portal 2. Gra dla jednej osoby która jest jedną z najlepszych gier na świecie! Fabuła która wciąga i zagadki które są łatwe i trudne. Przechodząc portal 2 naprawdę świetnie się bawiłem i fabuła ciągnęła do przodu, do przodu! Niektóre łatwe zagadki są trudne, a trudne łatwe! W niektórych naprawdę da się wyczuć to że pomieszczenia testowe były robione przez osobę która wiedziała jak robić pomieszczenia by były bez błędów i z easter eggami! Naprawdę daje 10/10 bo gra zasługuje na 3 odsłone jak HALF-LIFE: ALYX! 
Polecam!
Jeder sollte dieses Spiel gespielt haben!

I still play this game even though I've had this game since it was first released on steam. I remember when the first Portal was going to be a Half Life mod but ended up being it's own game. If you haven't played this game by now, you need to get this one.
Really unique gameplay concept, on-point dark humor and great multiplayer campaign. Not to mention a bunch of secrets and level editors.

Truly everything you could want in a singleplayer game -- engaging gameplay, superb story telling, and a magnificently atmospheric world. Also extremely fun to speedrun.

This game is just AMAZING. The mechanics are fun and challenging, the graphics are remarkable for the source engine, and the story is nothing short of exceptional. The game is almost infinitely playable as I have played through it over ten times. The cooperative mode is great, and the test builder is an awesome addition. Overall this game may be one of the best I have ever played.
